com.deflatedpickle.bugmagic.api.capability

Interface ISpellCaster


  • public ISpellCaster

    An interface for things that can cast spells

    Officially, this is for items, such as a wand, but this count be added to anything

    See Also:
    interface ISpellLearner

    • Method Detail

      • getCastSpellMap

        @NotNull
java.util.HashMap<com.deflatedpickle.bugmagic.api.spell.Spell,java.lang.Integer> getCastSpellMap()

        Returns the current amount of each spell casted

        Newly cast spells will increase the count of the spell Uncast spells will decrease the count, unless decreasing it would result in 0, then the spell key is removed.

        Returns:
        org.jetbrains.dokka.NodeRenderContent@7404a93c: A map of cast spells.

      • setOwner

        void setOwner(@Nullable
              java.util.UUID value)

        Sets the owner of the spell caster

        Officially, this is for a player that owns a wand, but if applied to a player, this would be the player. The player would need to be a interface ISpellLearner for this to be of much use.

        Parameters:
        value - The ID of the owner.
        See Also:
        interface ISpellLearner

      • getOwner

        @Nullable
java.util.UUID getOwner()

        Gets the owner of the spell caster

        Returns:

        Whether the spell caster is casting
